title: SOLD 1913 T200 New York Nationals SGC 2

posts.post_title: SOLD 1913 T200 New York Nationals SGC 2
posts.post_content:
1913 T200 New York Nationals (Giants) SGC Good 2.
Outstanding centering and you will notice extremely crisp registration and photo quality card on this card. New York Giants team card features HOFers Marquard, McGraw, Mathewson, Thorpe’s first professional card. Agreed price to be paid via PayPal or Venmo
